vulnerability_findings.name: use-abi-encodecall-instead-of-encodewithselector
vulnerability_findings.message: To guarantee arguments type safety it is recommended to use `abi.encodeCall` instead of `abi.encodeWithSelector`.

vulnerability_findings.name: init-variables-with-default-value
vulnerability_findings.message: Uninitialized variables are assigned with the types default value. Explicitly initializing a variable with its default value costs unnecessary gas.

vulnerability_findings.name: use-short-revert-string
vulnerability_findings.message: Shortening revert strings to fit in 32 bytes will decrease gas costs for deployment and  gas costs when the revert condition has been met.

vulnerability_findings.name: curve-readonly-reentrancy
vulnerability_findings.message: ICurveFi(curvefi).get_virtual_price() call on a Curve pool is not protected from the read- only reentrancy.

vulnerability_findings.name: no-slippage-check
vulnerability_findings.message: No slippage check in a Uniswap v2/v3 trade

vulnerability_findings.name: no-slippage-check

vulnerability_findings.name: constant-function
vulnerability_findings.message: Address.isContract (StrategyPickleCRVRenWBTC.sol#70-76) is declared view but contains assembly code

vulnerability_findings.name: incorrect-equality
vulnerability_findings.message:
StrategyCRVRenWBTCPickle.balanceOfPickle (StrategyPickleCRVRenWBTC.sol#320-330) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- pickletokenNum == 0

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in StrategyCRVRenWBTCPickle._withdrawSome (StrategyPickleCRVRenWBTC.sol#291-305):
	External calls:
	- _p3crv = _amount.mul(1e18).div(yERC20(pickleJar).getRatio()) (StrategyPickleCRVRenWBTC.sol#292)
	- _before = IERC20(pickleJar).balanceOf(address(this)) (StrategyPickleCRVRenWBTC.sol#293)
	- pERC20(PICKLE).withdraw(pickleindex,_p3crv) (StrategyPickleCRVRenWBTC.sol#300)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- pledgePickles (StrategyPickleCRVRenWBTC.sol#301)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in StrategyCRVRenWBTCPickle.harvest (StrategyPickleCRVRenWBTC.sol#345-350):
	External calls:
	- pERC20(PICKLE).withdraw(pickleindex,pledgePickles) (StrategyPickleCRVRenWBTC.sol#347)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- pledgePickles (StrategyPickleCRVRenWBTC.sol#348)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in StrategyCRVRenWBTCPickle.harvest (StrategyPickleCRVRenWBTC.sol#345-350):
	External calls:
	- pERC20(PICKLE).withdraw(pickleindex,pledgePickles) (StrategyPickleCRVRenWBTC.sol#347)
	- redelivery() (StrategyPickleCRVRenWBTC.sol#349)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- pledgePickles (StrategyPickleCRVRenWBTC.sol#349)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in StrategyCRVRenWBTCPickle.withdrawAll (StrategyPickleCRVRenWBTC.sol#281-288):
	External calls:
	- amount = balanceOf() (StrategyPickleCRVRenWBTC.sol#282)
	- balance = _withdraw(amount) (StrategyPickleCRVRenWBTC.sol#283)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- pledgePickles (StrategyPickleCRVRenWBTC.sol#283)

vulnerability_findings.name: unused-return
vulnerability_findings.message:
StrategyCRVRenWBTCPickle.doApprove (StrategyPickleCRVRenWBTC.sol#232-235) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-IERC20(pickletoken).approve(unirouter,0) (StrategyPickleCRVRenWBTC.sol#233)
	-IERC20(pickletoken).approve(unirouter,uint256(- 1)) (StrategyPickleCRVRenWBTC.sol#234)

vulnerability_findings.name: unused-return
vulnerability_findings.message:
StrategyCRVRenWBTCPickle.redelivery (StrategyPickleCRVRenWBTC.sol#352-369) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-UniswapRouter(unirouter).swapExactTokensForTokens(_2token,0,swap2TokenRouting,address(this),now.add(1800)) (StrategyPickleCRVRenWBTC.sol#358)
	-UniswapRouter(unirouter).swapExactTokensForTokens(_2bt,0,swap2BTRouting,Controller(controller).rewards(),now.add(1800)) (StrategyPickleCRVRenWBTC.sol#359)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-benign
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in StrategyCRVRenWBTCPickle.constructor (StrategyPickleCRVRenWBTC.sol#224-230):
	External calls:
	- doApprove() (StrategyPickleCRVRenWBTC.sol#227)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- swap2BTRouting (StrategyPickleCRVRenWBTC.sol#228)
	- swap2TokenRouting (StrategyPickleCRVRenWBTC.sol#229)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-benign
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in StrategyCRVRenWBTCPickle.deposit (StrategyPickleCRVRenWBTC.sol#237-254):
	External calls:
	- _crvpla = IERC20(crvPla).balanceOf(address(this)) (StrategyPickleCRVRenWBTC.sol#238)
	- yERC20(pickleJar).deposit(_crvpla) (StrategyPickleCRVRenWBTC.sol#243)
	- _p3crv = IERC20(pickleJar).balanceOf(address(this)) (StrategyPickleCRVRenWBTC.sol#246)
	- pERC20(PICKLE).deposit(pickleindex,_p3crv) (StrategyPickleCRVRenWBTC.sol#251)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- pledgePickles (StrategyPickleCRVRenWBTC.sol#252)
